FuncDef: This command configures matching on the ICMP or ICMPv6 type field in the ICMP or ICMPv6 header of an IPv4 or IPv6 packet as a network QoS match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ICMP or ICMPv6 type value that must be present to match. Value can be expressed as a decimal integer, or in hexadecimal or binary format, or even using keywords. Values-0 to 255 (Decimal).
